Generation IV.Diamond: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
Generation IV.Pearl: The shell is hardened soil. Some Pokémon come to peck the berries growing on the trees on its back.
Generation IV.Platinum: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
Generation IV.HeartGold: A Grotle that lives in the forest is said to have its own secret springwater.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: A Grotle that lives in the forest is said to have its own secret springwater.

Generation V.Black: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
Generation V.White: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
Generation V.Black 2: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
Generation V.White 2: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.

Generation VI.X: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
Generation VI.Y: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe the trees on its shell.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Its shell is hardened soil. Some Pokémon come to peck the berries growing on the trees on its back.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Appears where there is clean spring water. The fruit that grows on the shrubs on its shell is sweet, nutritious, and truly delicious.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Grotle live in the forest. Each is said to have its own secret place for getting clean springwater.
Generation IX.Violet: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.

Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Crimson Mirelands : near Droning Meadow , massive mass outbreaks
